name: "Do You Believe in Monsters?" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [Crayon on notebook paper with digital embellishments, color, and moshing.] Maybe you believe in monsters, and maybe you don't... But if you believe with all of your liver and pancreas, we CAN make these monsters real! (I hope your liver is still functioning... Mine is pretty good, I think...) Monsters are what makes life worth living! Or some bullshit like that. Ha! ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
